save routes to flow variables
save farms to flow variables
prepare routes to map
func:
var colors = {
    "mas_gener": "red",
    "mas_almar": "blue",
    "can_siset": "green",
    "mas_colom": "yellow",
    "mas_badosa": "black"
}

var route = {
    "name": msg.farm_name,
    "line": msg.payload.route,
    "color": colors[msg.farm_name]
}

msg.payload = route
return msg

name: prepare mas_gener to map
update cows
create & save fake cow data
read cow from flow variable
func:
farm_id = msg.topic
cow_id = msg.payload

flow_cow_info = "farms." + farm_id + ".cows." + String(cow_id) // preparas el string para acceder a la informacion

cow = flow.get(flow_cow_info) // obtienes toda la info de una sola vaca

msg.payload = cow

return msg;
